WHEREAS the President is satisfied that the person named in the
Schedule to this Order is entitled to hold the office specified therein
as required by subsection (2) of section throfe thee C hiefs Act.
NowTH EREFORE, in exercise of the powers contained in section
throfe thee C hiefs Act, the following Order is hereby made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Chiefs (Recognition) (No.- 7) Title
Order, 1999.
2. The person named in the Schedule to this Order is hereby Recognition
recognised as being within the area in Zambia described in the ofC hief
Schedule, the holder of the office specified in the Schedule.
